src:
Siap Bahas Sampai Malam, DPRD Targetkan KUA-PPAS DKI Diteken 5 November
01 Nov 2019, 13:35 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - DPRD DKI Jakarta masih melakukan pembahasan Kebijakan Umum APBD Plafon Prioritas Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) DKI 2020. DPRD menyebut KUA-PPAS ditargetkan akan berlangsung 5 November 2019.
"Kira-kira tanggal 5 udah bisa, KUA PPAS bukan diketok, ditandatangani bersama atau MoU (memorandum of understanding)," ujar Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta M Taufik di gedung DPRD DKI Jakarta, Jl Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Taufik mengatakan, nantinya penandatangan akan dilakukan dalam rapat paripurna KUA-PPAS. Sebelum paripurna, DPRD akan terlebih dulu menggelar rapat Badan Anggaran (Banggar).



"Nantikan Banggar dulu, bahas pagi, udah selesai. Sorenya paripurna. Paripurnanya kan cuma tandatangan," kata Taufik.
Politikus Gerindra itu menyebut setelah penandatanganan MoU, pihaknya memiliki waktu 3 minggu untuk pembahasan APBD. Menurut Taufik, waktu tersebut cukup bila pembahasan dilakukan secara serius.
text:
Ready to Discuss Until Tonight, DPRD Targets KUA-PPAS DKI Signed November 5
01 Nov 2019, 13:35 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta DPRD is still discussing the General Policy of the 2020 2020 Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS). The DPRD said the KUA-PPAS is targeted to take place on November 5, 2019.
"Around the 5th, we can, KUA PPAS is not signed, jointly signed or MoU (memorandum of understanding)," said Deputy Chairman of DKI Jakarta DPRD M Taufik in the DKI Jakarta DPRD building, Jl Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Friday (1 / 11/2019).
Taufik said, the signing would be done at the KUA-PPAS plenary meeting. Before the plenary session, the DPRD will first hold a Budget Agency (Banggar) meeting.



"Wait for Banggar first, discuss the morning, it's over. In the afternoon, it's perfect. The plenary is only a signature," said Taufik.
The Gerindra politician said after signing the MoU, his party had 3 weeks to discuss the APBD. According to Taufik, the time is sufficient if the discussion is carried out seriously.
